titles.title: A resolution designating membership on certain standing committees of the House.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/10/1987--Introduced. Elects the following Members of the House of Representatives to the specified committees: (1) Joe Kolter to the Committee on House Administration; and (2) Bruce A. Morrison to the Committee on the District of Columbia.
